CustomField.description: If set, overrides the default Group to which this Assignment's Timecard Revenue Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if the Project or Resource are in a different Group. Note that either way, the Timecard Revenue Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals and same Resource's Resource Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, overrides the default Group to which this Assignment's Timecard Revenue Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if the Project or Resource are in a different Group.
CustomField.label: Override Timecard Revenue Group
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Override Timecard Revenue Group For Assignments
